title.rendered: 20L Enviro Mop & Buff / Sealed and Shiny Floor Cleaner & Maintainer

content.rendered:
Enviro Mop & Buff Floor Maintainer / Cleaner   Enviro Mop & Buff floor maintainer cleaner removes scuff marks and is designed for sealed floors and auto burnishing applications.   Enviro Mop & Buff is carefully formulated for Mop-on application to revitalize shiny floors.  Enviro Mop & Buff interval between floor coating applications.  Enviro Mop & Buff is made from high-quality bio-degradable materials.

BENEFITS:    Reduces overall maintenance cost by reducing the frequency of recoating cycle.  Produces deep glossy wet-look. Eliminates spray buffing.  Concentrated for economical use.  Classified by UL as a slip resistance only.

DIRECTIONS AS MOP & BUFF:    Dilute 1:15 part water. Mop the area using a clean long mop, where marks are encountered rub with a mop. Allow to dry and buff using a hard brush or medium pad under a high-speed polishing machine until desired gloss is attained.

DIRECTIONS AS SPRAY & BUFF:  Dilute 1:5 part water in a spray bottle. When buffing the floor with a high-speed machine you may encounter scuff marks. Spay onto these spots and continue to buff until the floor is clean from marks.
